ending_default.title: Something Special
ending_default.description: You've become more than just a bun. Maybe.

ending_good_silent.title: Avocado Savior
ending_good_silent.description: Sometimes being extra really does pay off.

ending_bad_silent.title: Silent But Deadly
ending_bad_silent.description: Turns out lingering too long has consequences.

ending_not_real_burger.title: Imposter Syndrome
ending_not_real_burger.description: You tried to pass as something you're not.

ending_empty.title: Existential Crisis
ending_empty.description: You remained pure. Empty, but pure.

ending_dysentery.title: Oregon Trail Veteran
ending_dysentery.description: You have died of dysentery. Classic.

burger_blt.title: BLT Club Member
burger_blt.description: Who needs meat when you've got this crispy trio?

burger_cheeseburger.title: The Classic
burger_cheeseburger.description: Meat and cheese. Simple. Perfect. Timeless.

rpg_victory.title: Trash Odyssey Champion
rpg_victory.description: You survived the trash can and reached the lunchbox.

rpg_secret_victory.title: Legendary Bun
rpg_secret_victory.description: You defeated the Hungry Dog. You are legend.

rpg_defeat_spoiled_milk.title: Dairy Destroyer
rpg_defeat_spoiled_milk.description: The curdled nightmare fell before you.

rpg_defeat_raccoon_king.title: Throne Usurper
rpg_defeat_raccoon_king.description: You dethroned the ruler of the backyard.

rpg_defeat_hungry_dog.title: Giant Slayer
rpg_defeat_hungry_dog.description: You defeated a creature 10,000 times your size.

rpg_level_10.title: Maximum Power
rpg_level_10.description: You've reached level 10. The ultimate bun.

rpg_high_attack.title: Power Overwhelming
rpg_high_attack.description: Your attack stat reached 30 or higher.

rpg_speedster.title: Lightning Bun
rpg_speedster.description: Your speed stat reached 20 or higher.

rpg_all_ingredients.title: Complete Collection
rpg_all_ingredients.description: You brought all 9 ingredients from Act 1 into Act 2.
